item.title: Bitcoin's Eternal Struggle
item.description: How Bitcoin Thrives on the Edge between Order and Chaos This article by Gigi was published on dergigi.com website. Contribute. if you’d prefer to consume this essay in audio format, you can listen to it here (narrated by Guy Swann of the Bitcoin Audible Podcast.) Bitcoin works. No matter what other opinions you hold about this strange phenomenon, it undoubtedly works, marches on, or, as I (and others) have previously argued, is alive.
